snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio is now seeking to revive the populist zeal of his mayoral bid for a new campaign: persuading state lawmakers to back a tax increase to pay for prekindergarten.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is attempting to revive the populist zeal of his mayoral bid as he seeks to persuade state lawmakers to back a tax increase to pay for prekindergarten; has assembled familiar arsenal of political operatives, actives and donors, as well as new allies like labor unions who are looking to curry favor ahead of contract negotiations with City Hall; effort will amount to test of de Blasio's political clout.

byline.original: By JAVIER C. HERNÁNDEZ and NIKITA STEWART

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio is now seeking to revive the populist zeal of his mayoral bid for a new campaign: persuading state lawmakers to back a tax increase to pay for prekindergarten.

headline.main: De Blasio Tests Political Might in Pre-K Push
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Tests Political Might in Pre-K Push
